1371: Vandelghis was born in Paternoster straetje in 1371.
1390: Vandelghis moved to De Tuyt.A.6 after marriage.
Got married to Auesoete at age 20 in 1390.
1383: Lost father at the age of 12.
1392: Lost sibling Lielde in 1392 when Lielde was 19.
Had a daughter with Auesoete, Badeloghen, at age 21.
1395: Lost daughter Yda when Yda was 0 years old.
Lost his wife Auesoete and their daughter Yda  while Auesoete was giving birth when he was 24.
Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 4 years old.
Got married a second time to Gheesen at age 25 in 1395.
1393: Had a son with Auesoete, Arnekin, at age 22.
1394: Had a daughter with Auesoete, Moerseil, at age 23.
